Detailed Description

Class implementing automated performance testing of a trained controller model.

This class implements automated testing of model performance using a provided model and environment. The tests are performed directly in the existing Bullet instance through the gym_jointcontrol environment. Member functions of the jointcontrol environment are accessed as part of the GymEnv instance (using env.env.* instead of env.*).

  model,
  modelname,
  freqs = [1, 5, 10, 20, 50] 
) 
Class constructor

Params:
    - env:          gym_jointcontrol environment instance used for testing
    - model:        RL model, that uses model.predict(obs) to determine agent actions
    - modelname:    String describing the model, name will be used as the name of the generated results folder

Definition at line 17 of file controllerTest.py.

Member Function Documentation

◆ plotResults()

def controllerTest.controllerTest.plotResults (   self,
  gui = False,
  outpath = None 
) 
Plots test results stored in self.testResults 

Params:
    - gui:      If True, a testreport will be plotted using matplotlib.
    - outpath:  If set, the testreport and raw test data will be saved at the path's location.
        The report is saved as a pdf, while the data is stored in json format.


Definition at line 111 of file controllerTest.py.

◆ removeArraysFromTestResults()

def controllerTest.controllerTest.removeArraysFromTestResults (   self) 
Serialises test results in order to save them as json format. 

This method is required, since json cannot serialise dicts containing numpy arrays.
